column4: i have haveing problems finding info on enabling a swap partition. Any one got a link for how to do it in ubuntu?
not sure if it worked, and dont know how to make it come on at startup
is the swap defined in the fstab?
that would be one thing to try.. hang on.. I'll see what my fstab says..
dont know how it is suppose to look in fstab :)
this is the line in my fstab       UUID=da19e64e-3350-42dd-b705-d0915a82c780 none swap sw 0 0
you can get the uuid of your partition using sudo blkid
yea just wasnt sure for the none / 0 0 parts of it :)
is it really bad? or just not as good as you thought it'd be?.. it might be that the card is pretty new and support in the driver isn't really up to speed yet
Its barly doing better then the 6600GT i had in the computer
like its only doing maybe 5% better then the 6600GT.
use 1-2 device not accepting address 6, error -62
